# Kakeibo v2 - Development Guide

## Commit Convention

Format: \`type(scope): description\`

**Types:** feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert  
**Scopes:** core, web, mobile, deps, config, release

## Code Standards

- Single quotes
- 2-space indentation
- 100 char line width
- Semicolons required
- Auto-organize imports
- No unused variables
- Avoid explicit any

## Tech Stack

- Turborepo ^2.6.3
- TypeScript ^5.9.3
- Biome ^2.3.10
- Lefthook ^2.0.12
- React ^19.2.3
- React Native ^0.83.1
- TanStack Router ^1.141.6
- Vite ^7.3.0
- Zustand ^5.0.9
